title: Mars in Aries
summary: Energy is hot, direct, and ready to act. Courage rises, along with impatience for delays. The opportunity is to channel initiative into clear targets instead of scattering or rushing.

meaning.headline: Drive seeks immediate action and visible progress.

frames.text: Mars in Aries amplifies boldness, competition, and the urge to start.
Momentum builds quickly when direction is named.
Short, decisive efforts beat long deliberation today.
Force is the same as leadership or guarantees success.

opportunities: Taking action on a personal goal

do: Pick one priority and tackle it first.
Signal your pace so others can opt in or out.
Use confidence to open doors, not push through them.
avoid: Turning every task into a battle

reusable_lines.text: Aim the spark at one clear target.
Quick moves land best when they include a check-in.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can energize initiative and courage
Agency-forward language: you choose how to direct the drive
Contextual framing: speed helps when matched with awareness

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
